languages.english-overview:
CMS Made Simple provides a fast and easy way to create a professional web site and manage its content, whether it's for a small business or a multinational corporation!
CMS Made Simple provides a mechanism for the website administrator to create and manage pages, their layout, and their content. CMS Made Simple is unobtrusive. You can create a table based layout, or a fully validating XHTML/CSS layout.
CMS Made Simple is released under the GPL LICENSE.

ul.li: Full template support, for unlimited looks without changing a line of content
Easy wizard based install and upgrade procedures
Admin panel with multiple language support
Content hierarchy with unlimited depth and size
Integrated file manager w/ upload capabilities
Friendly support in forums and irc
